## 🖌️ Editable Canva Templates

🎨 Use these editable templates to customize flyers, postcards, and social media posts directly in Canva.  
Just click → Canva will copy the template into your account → edit text, images, colors, and export.

- 🏠 [Open House Flyer Template (Edit in Canva)](https://YOUR_CANVA_LINK_HERE)  
- 📬 [Just Listed Postcard Template (Edit in Canva)](https://YOUR_CANVA_LINK_HERE)  
- 📱 [Instagram Post Template (Edit in Canva)](https://YOUR_CANVA_LINK_HERE)

## 📖 How to Use

1️⃣ **Editable Canva Templates:**  
Click the Canva link → edit directly in Canva → export to PDF or PNG for print or social media.

2️⃣ **PNG Previews:**  
Click to view or download → use in your marketing materials or social content.

3️⃣ **More templates coming soon — stay tuned!**
